headerText: The `v-avatar` component is typically used to display circular user profile pictures. This component will allow you to dynamically size and border radius of responsive images, icons, and text. A **tile** variation is available for displaying an avatar without border radius.

usage.desc: Avatars in their simplist form display content within a circular container.

profile.desc: Using the **tile** prop, we can create a sleek hardlined profile card.

advanced.desc: Combining an avatar with other components allows you to build beautiful user interfaces right out of the box.

variations.desc: An avatar accepts the `v-icon` component, an image or text. Mix and match functionality to create something unique.
